Name: rll
AboutMe:
I am a computer scientist invested in bringing the best of nature into computation. I specialise in Evolutionary Computation, in particular biologically inspired representations for evolutionary algorithms.

In the last ten years I have worked as a software engineer, researcher, and teaching assistant. I have participated in the full-cycle of the software development, in software maintenance projects, and in R&D projects.

When I am not focused on how to replicate biological mechanisms in algorithms, you may hear the low frequencies of my tuba, or find me watching F1.
